name: RoboQ
description:
Oh no! Robots are attacking! Luckily, we know the pattern in which they attack. Unluckily, we can only stop their inner clock for 20 seconds. That should be enough to calculate the correct way of using our limited tools.

Controls
  • A to attack
  • S to defend
  • D to hack

Or just click on the buttons with mouse.

You will get a set of rules to defeat robot queue. Remember, higher rules have higher priority!

Credits

Design - karasikrus

Programming - RoboCat91

Art - Hios
